author: affiliates@fandango.com
title: 6. Fist Fight $6.4M
text: The best movie By nathanroubik2738384 I just saw this movie and it's basically has no bad stuff in it except language and I'm 12 and I saw this great movie... Fist Fight!?? Awesome movie! Laughed the whole way through. Gotta see it again!... Terrible Movie By cbudinsky I don't know why you can't go to the theater anymore to see a comedy without it being nothing but the F word, drugs and sex ... do they not make comedies without this? Very very disappointed! And I... Fist Fight By dianeharden 1st movie I ever remember getting up and leaving. It wasn't funny and actually pretty boring. I wish I could get a refund.... If there was a "zero" star rating i would use it By annettehodges1 This movie started out as badly as any I've seen. It's not funny to see kids destroying a school and the disrespect toward each other is representative of people who think bullying is funny. Naked... 100% GO SEE FINALLY A MOVIE THAT LIVES UP TO THE HYPE !!!... Not worth your money By jajajinx Let me begin by saying I am a big fan of Charlie Day and his work on IASIP (Dayman anyone?). That being said, this movie and its attempt at humor was horrible. Not worth the $12 ticket or $50 popcorn.... BUYER BEWARE By air23mf IF you DON'T like funny movies, this one is not for you. This is as funny as it gets. All-star comedian class. Well written and directed. 5 stars no doubt!... By md11son I liked this the first time I saw it when it was called Three O'Clock High. There are movies that remind viewers that actors like Charlie Day and Ice Cube are contractually forced to make in order to... #teacherfight By ramengirl2016 This movie in the beginning can be a little silly, but once it gets going it turns into the great funny movie it is. Don't get me wrong just because the beginning was a little silly doesn't mean it...
